name: Octo Island
description:
Controls:

  • Move - Left/Right arrow keys.
  • Jump - "Space" key.
  • Sword Attack - "D" key.
  • Shoot Gun - "S" key.
  • Pause - Shift/ESC key.
  • Menu Navigation - Up/Down arrow keys.
  • Menu Select - "Enter" key.

Description:

Octo Island is a Game Jam game that my buddy ScruffMuhGruff and I worked on for fun. You are a pirate in search of treasure and have found an island full of treasure-hoarding octopuses. You must fend off the ever-increasing hoards of octopuses and collect as much treasure as possible before you run out of health.

Good luck!

Note:

This game was completed in an extremely small time window due to the nature of the project (Game Jam), and as such, may have minor bugs and/or be lacking is some features one might expect from similar games. We hope you all enjoy!

If the Browser version is not performing as one would hope, the windows build is available for download below. Just extract and run!

If you like Octo Island's art, feel free to check out ScruffMuhGruff's stuff here:
